name: Lightspoke Dbx: DBXML Server
short_description: Lightspoke Dbx is a fast XML database web service layer over Berkeley DB XML. Dbx offers xpath queries, native xml document management and web based administration of containers, documents and indexes.  XSLT, security, full text indexing, xupdate planned
